# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, r"\\s+")
    lines = String[]
    line = String("")
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = String(word)
        else
            line *= String(word) * " "
        end
    end
    if length(line) > 0
        push!(lines, line)
    end
    join(lines, "\n")
end

wrap_string("Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.")
```

Example output:

```julia
"Lorem ipsum dolor sit\namet, consectetur\nadipiscing elit,\nsed do eiusmod tempor\nincididunt ut labore et\nolore magna aliqua.\nUt enim ad minim veniam,\nquis nostrud exercitation\nullamco laboris nisi ut\naliquip ex ea commodo consequat."
```
